entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:17 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
